qas.question: Besides online gaming and media distribution, what other feature made the 360 influential, according to TechRadar?
How many years after initial launch of the console was Kinect released?
Besides it's features, what did Kinect do for the 360 in terms of sales?

answers.text: extended the life of the console

plausible_answers.text: Five years after the Xbox 360's original debut

qas.question: When was the Xbox 360 deemed the most influential gaming system?
What console was the fastest selling in history?
Who considered the Kinect the most influential electronic device?
The Xbox brand turned away from multimedia to what?

context: <b6_0>TechRadar<b6_0/> deemed the Xbox 360 as the most influential game system through its emphasis of <b7_0>digital media distribution<b7_0/>, Xbox Live online gaming service, and <a0_0>game achievement feature<a0_0/>. During the console's lifetime, the Xbox brand has grown from <b8_0>gaming-only<b8_0/> to encompassing all multimedia, turning it into a hub for "living-room computing environment". <a1_0><b4_0>Five years<a1_0/> after the <b5_0>Xbox 360<b5_0/>'s original debut<b4_0/>, the well-received Kinect <a3_0>motion capture camera<a3_0/> was released, which became the fastest selling consumer electronic device in history, and <a2_0>extended the life of the console<a2_0/>.
